START.TITLE: Start your Travel

CHECKBOX.TEXT: I have read and agree to the
CHECKBOX.ERROR: Please agree to the privacy policy!

START.HAVE_ACCOUNT: Already have an account? Sign in!

VERIFY_EMAIL.TITLE: Verify your Email...
VERIFY_EMAIL.ERROR: We could not verify your Email!

RECOVER_EMAIL.TITLE: Recover your Email...
RECOVER_EMAIL.SUCCESS: We have recovered your Email successfully!
RECOVER_EMAIL.ERROR: We could not recover your Email!

ERROR.DEFAULT: Something went wrong - Please try again later
ERROR.INVALID: Your Email or Password was invalid
ERROR.NOT_FOUND: We could not found this user account!
ERROR.IN_USE: This login credentials are already in use
ERROR.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid Email Address!
ERROR.NOT_SAVED: Your data was not saved, please try again later
ERROR.DISABLED: Your account was blocked, please contact support@example.com
ERROR.WEAK_PASSWORD: The password has to be at least 6 characters!
ERROR.NETWORK: We could not connect to the internet!
ERROR.SIGNUP: We could not create your account!
ERROR.QUOTA: We have not enough space to place the data for this app!
ERROR.RECENT_LOGIN: Your last login is too far away. Please logout and login again!
ERROR.INVALID_CODE: The code to verfigy your Email is wrong or you have already verified your Email!

SUCCESS.USER_SAVING: Your account details will be saved
SUCCESS.USER_SAVED: Your account details are saved successfully
SUCCESS.MAIL_SAVED: Your account was successfully saved with your Email!
SUCCESS.MAIL_NEW: We have changed your Email-Address and send you a confirmation link!
SUCCESS.MAIL_VERIFICATION: We send you an Email to verfiy your Email-Address!
SUCCESS.MAIL_RECOVERED: Your Email has been recovered successfully!
SUCCESS.MAIL_RESET_PASSWORD: We send you an Email to reset your password!
SUCCESS.SMS_SEND: We have send you a SMS with the verification code

EXPLANATION.TITLE: My Travel
EXPLANATION.DESCRIPTION: Start your next travel step by step!

REGISTER.TITLE: Register now for free!
REGISTER.NO_ACCOUNT: I do not want to create an account!
REGISTER.NO_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: If you don't create an account you cannot access your travel on another device.

END.TITLE: What's next?
END.DESCRIPTION: You can now create your next travel!
